item.title: ::Empty for normal players?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

uhmmmm, why don’t you want players to have the ability to drop their items?

tbh, that’s a terrible idea. If someone wants to drop a specific item, and you don’t allow that but instead you provide the “empty” feature, it’s a bad decision. using that code would empty your whole inv.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Empty for normal players?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

how can i add ::empty for normal players so if they drop it comes up saying [do not drop ur items do ::Empty]
here is my command i have, :o

if (command.startsWith("empty")) { long now = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (now - lastAction < 10000) { sM("You must wait 60 seconds after an action to ::empty!"); lastAction = now; } else { removeAllItems(); } }

and can i delete the timer??

Read full topic
